metadata.title: CVE-2021-31597 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The xmlhttprequest-ssl package before 1.6.1 for Node.js disables SSLcertificate validation by default, because rejectUnauthorized (when theproperty exists but is undefined) is considered to be false within thehttps.request function of Node.js. In other words, no certificate is everrejected.

criterions.comment: node-xmlhttprequest-ssl package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
